com.xconns.peerdevicenet

Interface RouterConnectionClient.ConnectionHandler

  • Enclosing class:
    RouterConnectionClient

    public static interface RouterConnectionClient.ConnectionHandler
    ConnectionHandler exposes client side async messaging one-way AIDL api to allow ConnectionService call back to notify events such as network attachment and detachment, device connection and disconnection. It implements IConnectionHandler.aidl.

    It exposes the following groups of callback methods in accordance with ConnectionHandler AIDL api:

    • network detection: 
       void onGetActiveNetwork(NetInfo net)
 void onGetNetworks(NetInfo[] nets)
 void onNetworkActivated(NetInfo net)
 void onNetworkConnecting(NetInfo net)
 void onNetworkConnected(NetInfo net)
 void onNetworkDisconnected(NetInfo net)
 void onNetworkConnectionFailed(NetInfo net)
    • peer discovery: 
       onSearchStart(DeviceInfo groupLeader)
 onSearchFoundDevice(DeviceInfo device, boolean useSSL)
 onSearchComplete()
    • peer device connection: 
       onConnected(DeviceInfo peerInfo)
 onConnecting(DeviceInfo device, byte[] token)
 onConnectionFailed(DeviceInfo device, int rejectCode)
 onDisconnected(DeviceInfo peerInfo)
    • info query: 
       onSetConnectionInfo()
 onGetConnectionInfo(String devName, boolean useSSL, int liveTime, int connTime, int searchTime)
 onGetDeviceInfo(DeviceInfo device)
 onGetPeerDevices(DeviceInfo[] devices)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onConnected(DeviceInfo peerInfo)
      Notify client that a peer device successfully connected to this device; either because the client accept peer connection request or peer accept the client's connection request.
      void onConnecting(DeviceInfo device, byte[] token)
      Notify client a peer device is trying to connect to this device.
      void onConnectionFailed(DeviceInfo device, int rejectCode)
      Notify client its attempt to connect to peer device failed.
      void onDisconnected(DeviceInfo peerInfo)
      Notify client a peer device disconnected; either because the client or its peer called disconnect() api; or because network failed.
      void onError(java.lang.String errInfo)
      Notify clients about two kinds of errors: errors happening at server processing.
      void onGetActiveNetwork(NetInfo net)
      Pass to clients info about the network used to connect to peer devices.
      void onGetConnectionInfo(java.lang.String devName, boolean useSSL, int liveTime, int connTime, int searchTime)
      Reply to client connection related settings currently active at Connection Service; This is the response to getConnectionInfo() api call.
      void onGetDeviceInfo(DeviceInfo device)
      Reply to client info about this device; This is the response to getDeviceInfo() api call.
      void onGetNetworks(NetInfo[] nets)
      Pass to clients info about currently attached networks detected by ConnectionService.
      void onGetPeerDevices(DeviceInfo[] devices)
      Reply to client info about peer devices connected to this device.
      void onNetworkActivated(NetInfo net)
      Pass to clients info about network activated.
      void onNetworkConnected(NetInfo net)
      Notify clients that ConnectionService detects a new network.
      void onNetworkConnecting(NetInfo net)
      Notify clients that network connection is in process.
      void onNetworkConnectionFailed(NetInfo net)
      Notify clients that network connection attempt failed.
      void onNetworkDisconnected(NetInfo net)
      Notify clients that a network is disconnected.
      void onSearchComplete()
      Notify clients current active search session completes, either because clients called stopSearch() or search session timeout.
      void onSearchFoundDevice(DeviceInfo device, boolean useSSL)
      Notify clients in a search session a device is found.
      void onSearchStart(DeviceInfo groupLeader)
      Notify client a search session started; It is the response to startSearch() api call.
      void onSetConnectionInfo()
      Notify client its call to setConnectionInfo() api call succeed and connection related settings (device name, use SSL, connection timeout, etc.) have been updated successfully at Connection Service.

    • Method Detail

      • onError

        void onError(java.lang.String errInfo)
        Notify clients about two kinds of errors:
        • errors happening at server processing.
        • errors happening at client invoking ConnectionService api.
        Parameters:
        errInfo - the detailed error message

      • onGetNetworks

        void onGetNetworks(NetInfo[] nets)
        Pass to clients info about currently attached networks detected by ConnectionService. This is the response to getNetworks() api call.
        Parameters:
        nets - info about current networks to which the device is attached.

      • onGetActiveNetwork

        void onGetActiveNetwork(NetInfo net)
        Pass to clients info about the network used to connect to peer devices. This is the response to getActiveNetwork() call.
        Parameters:
        net - info about the network actively used to communicate with peer devices.

      • onNetworkConnected

        void onNetworkConnected(NetInfo net)
        Notify clients that ConnectionService detects a new network.
        Parameters:
        net - info about a network this device is newly attached.

      • onNetworkConnecting

        void onNetworkConnecting(NetInfo net)
        Notify clients that network connection is in process.
        Parameters:
        net - info about connecting network.

      • onNetworkConnectionFailed

        void onNetworkConnectionFailed(NetInfo net)
        Notify clients that network connection attempt failed.
        Parameters:
        net - info about network.

      • onNetworkDisconnected

        void onNetworkDisconnected(NetInfo net)
        Notify clients that a network is disconnected.
        Parameters:
        net - info about disconnected network.

      • onNetworkActivated

        void onNetworkActivated(NetInfo net)
        Pass to clients info about network activated. This is the response to activateNetwork() api call.
        Parameters:
        net - info of the network activated.

      • onSearchStart

        void onSearchStart(DeviceInfo groupLeader)
        Notify client a search session started; It is the response to startSearch() api call.
        Parameters:
        groupLeader - info of leader device which may run hotspot or own wifi direct group. It is the enabler for a group of devices to discover each other.

      • onSearchFoundDevice

        void onSearchFoundDevice(DeviceInfo device,
                       boolean useSSL)
        Notify clients in a search session a device is found.
        Parameters:
        device - info of found device (name, address, port number).
        useSSL - does connection to this device use TLS/SSL or not.

      • onSearchComplete

        void onSearchComplete()
        Notify clients current active search session completes, either because clients called stopSearch() or search session timeout.

      • onConnecting

        void onConnecting(DeviceInfo device,
                byte[] token)
        Notify client a peer device is trying to connect to this device.
        Parameters:
        device - peer device info which try to connect
        token - binary data passed by peer device as authentication token.

      • onConnectionFailed

        void onConnectionFailed(DeviceInfo device,
                      int rejectCode)
        Notify client its attempt to connect to peer device failed.
        Parameters:
        device - target peer device the client try to connect
        rejectCode - reason of connection failure.

      • onConnected

        void onConnected(DeviceInfo peerInfo)
        Notify client that a peer device successfully connected to this device; either because the client accept peer connection request or peer accept the client's connection request.
        Parameters:
        peerInfo - info of connected device.

      • onDisconnected

        void onDisconnected(DeviceInfo peerInfo)
        Notify client a peer device disconnected; either because the client or its peer called disconnect() api; or because network failed.
        Parameters:
        peerInfo - info of disconnected device.

      • onSetConnectionInfo

        void onSetConnectionInfo()
        Notify client its call to setConnectionInfo() api call succeed and connection related settings (device name, use SSL, connection timeout, etc.) have been updated successfully at Connection Service.

      • onGetConnectionInfo

        void onGetConnectionInfo(java.lang.String devName,
                       boolean useSSL,
                       int liveTime,
                       int connTime,
                       int searchTime)
        Reply to client connection related settings currently active at Connection Service; This is the response to getConnectionInfo() api call.
        Parameters:
        devName - name of this device
        useSSL - does this device use TLS/SSL connect to peer devices or not.
        liveTime - the period between successive verifications of liveness of peer device.
        connTime - peer device connection timeout.
        searchTime - search session timeout.

      • onGetDeviceInfo

        void onGetDeviceInfo(DeviceInfo device)
        Reply to client info about this device; This is the response to getDeviceInfo() api call.
        Parameters:
        device - info of this device (name, address, port).

      • onGetPeerDevices

        void onGetPeerDevices(DeviceInfo[] devices)
        Reply to client info about peer devices connected to this device.
        Parameters:
        devices - peer devices currently connected.
